channel.title: Use cases for OIN integrations :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Use cases Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Why is this here?: - At Oktane, the OIN Survey showed several customers citing the following as “Missing info with the OIN Docs”: - Best practices and use cases - Docs on use case scenarios - Use cases - Use case flows Use cases were consistently the most sought after docs

item.title: SSO app use cases
item.description: SSO app use cases Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Changes to be made: Need to inlcude a SSO + Universal Logout use case Links to original docs: ‘+ https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/oin-sso-overview/ (Why Build an SSO integration with Okta?) https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/oin-sso-overview/ (Use case examples) Why is this here?: Oktane 2024: Need additional research on which specific use cases customers are looking for.

item.title: Lifecycle management app use cases
item.description: Lifecycle management use cases Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Links to original docs: The use case examples from: Overview of lifecycle management in the OIN: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/oin-lifecycle-mgmt-overview/ Structure type: Concept Content type: Explanation Explanations present a more detailed dive into a single topic compared to Conceptual Overviews. They aim to clarify specific elements of the technology, offering developers practical insights or in-depth clarification on particular points of interest.

item.title: Service app use cases
item.description: Service app use cases Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Changes to be made: This is a new doc for new use cases, but you might be able to borrow some of the suggested existing doc for an introduction if you don’t use it all in (ID: 719) Links to original docs: ‘+ https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/oin-api-service-overview/ (Intro, integration benefits) Structure type: Concept
